mapper.select: select a.user_id ,a.birth_day ,a.position ,b.sns_kind ,b.sns_url from member_list a left join sns_member_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id and b.use_yn='Y' where a.use_yn='Y' order by a.order_seq asc , b.order_seq asc
select sns_kind ,sns_url from sns_corp_info where use_yn = 'Y' order by order_seq asc
